opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 5th day of June, 1998, the petition for allowance of appeal is denied in accordance with this court’s opinion in Jacobs v. Halloran, 551 Pa. 350, 710 A.2d 1098 (1998).
SAYLOR, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:
